data.comment: The first-half is under way at Riverside - Derby County kick-off to start the match.
Kamil Jozwiak is booked for the away team.
In the minute 33, Britt Assombalonga is on target to give Middlesbrough a 1-0 advantage.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Middlesbrough kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 46, The away team replace Martyn Waghorn with Louie Sibley.
Tom Lawrence (Derby County) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Nathan Byrne for Derby County has been booked by Peter Bankes and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 62, Middlesbrough make their first substitution with Marvin Johnson replacing Patrick Roberts.
Djed Spence is replacing Duncan Watmore for Middlesbrough at Riverside.
Lee Buchanan (Derby County) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 70, Duane Holmes is replacing Lee Buchanan for the away team.
Kazim is on a sub for Kamil Jozwiak for Derby County.
Own goal in Middlesbrough! Matt Clarke scores in his own net to make it 2-0.
In the minute 72, Neil Warnock (Middlesbrough) is making a third substitution, with Chuba Akpom replacing Britt Assombalonga.
Morgan Whittaker is replacing Tom Lawrence for the away team.
Goal! Marvin Johnson extends Middlesbrough's lead to 3-0.
In the minute 88, The home team replace Marcus Tavernier with Lewis Wing.
The match has come to a close in Middlesbrough. The final score is 3-0.
